by the way, I may have been wrong about the guy she fucks being a random guy. It's either a random dude, her uncle, or her brother. At the end of the last she explains that her brother loved her and they had sex a lot, not sure it goes into much more detail than that, and then he suddenly randomly left (or something)

We have sequels. In the next one, she has sex with a random guy (anal only, not sure if thats important story-wise), theres not much story in it besides the fact that (I think) the guy she fucks may be related to her... not entirely sure. Anyways, after that, we get a finale chapter (I think that's what it is) where MC has his hair grown out way longer. The story goes that MC got a girlfriend, a younger girl, and they broke up. While FMC (girl with a cut on her face) was having sex with the old guy he tried calling her (for advice probably), when she got done she noticed the phone calls and ran to the park where MC was, to find him crying. Fast forwarding a bit, they're having sex (I think its quite funny and also a bit sad that you can see the old guys cum dripping out of her ass as she's having lovey sex with MC), and a bit later (during the sex) he asks her to marry him (I think), she kind of says that she wants him too because she was jealous (I think) and then they get married(?)

The FINALE (PART 4) actually ends on a kinda happy and hopeful note. But be warned PART 3 is Pseudo-NTR (seeing what she does after turning down MC confession in "Your Just a Check Point") so I would advise you skip that part if you hate that shit and just jump to PART 4 instead.

FOR THOSE LOOKING FOR A CONTINUATION YOU CAN FIND ALL THE UNTRANSLATED PARTS ON 3HENTAI. They go in this order: (Yellow Cover) Kimi wa Nannimo Warukunai (THIS) / (Blue Cover) Kimi wa Tada no Tsukaten / (Red Cover) Kimi wa Shiranakute Ii Koto / (Purple Cover) Kimi wa Dame na Ko (FINALE).

Yeah, as others have said, can't beat off to this....it"s too real. The pain of loving someone, but hurting each other at the same time is brutal. So her brother did something to her? She clearly self-harms (or used to), and he's a victim of something (probably abused by his father). I honestly don"t know who"s right here. He has a right to love her, but it's presumptuous of him to think she needs saving. Then again, it's a doujin and maybe I'm thinking about it too much.....lol
